QuestData.Title: Machinations for Mechagon
QuestData.Description:
So Mechagon ain't just a fairy tale? Gotta admit I'm surprised.
But, if the tech on that king is any indication of what they've got out there for us to swipe, I am very, very happy to be wrong!
We can't rush into this. A good crew died today. That ain't happening again on my watch.
Meet me and Skaggit back in Zuldazar Harbor, and we'll build this expedition up right.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the Greasemonkey Skysneaker to Zuldazar Harbor.
